verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus is the Lord,
Jesus our Lord reigns.
He shall take the kingdoms
Of this world in His name
Every tribe and nation;
Every situation
Must declare that
Jesus is the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For the Lord our God
Has delivered Him from death,
And established Jesus as Lord.
He hath given Him the power
Over all that He hath made,
For our God
Hath made Him
Christ the Lord.
